page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Children from the Toot Hill and Robert Miles schools conducted surveys to find out about the sorts of jobs that the residents of Bingham do and where they go to work. 40% of the people work in Bingham itself. Over a quarter travelled to work in Nottingam. Although Bingham is a market town and in an agricultural area, only 1% work in{agriculture}. Nearly 70% work in{service industries like{shops and local government. Nearly a quarter work in{manufacturing on the small industrial estate in Bingham, or in Nottingham. A few people work in{mining or construction. Three quarters of the people work full time with 4% unemployed. Just over half the people use a car to get to work, and nearly a third walk or use a bicycle because they have jobs nearby.
